mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select chat_no as chatNo, room_no as roomNo, member_no as memberNo, TO_CHAR(chat_date, 'hh:mm')as chatDate, chat_content as chatContent, memberid as memberId from chat where room_no = #{roomNo} order by chat_no asc)c)
select room_no as roomNo, member_no1 as memberNo1, member_no2 as memberNo2, room_name as roomName, room_date as roomDate from room where member_no1 = #{memberNo1} and member_no2 = #{memberNo2}
select room_no as roomNo, member_no1 as memberNo1, member_no2 as memberNo2, room_name as roomName, room_date as roomDate from room where member_no1 = #{memberNo} or member_no2 = #{memberNo}
